title: Spellthief Lux particle bug
body: Spellthief Lux is currently missing her wand's light orbs.

replies.body:
Ack, literally unplayable. ;-; I'll see if I can get someone to take a look into this and see what's going on so you can continue lighting the way when you're face checking bushes. ;)

**EDIT**: Okie, so this is a bit deeper of a rabbit hole than I thought. It's more than just the VFX fell off the hookup. I've got a bug logged for the issue and have someone digging into it a bit.

Hey again! 

I've gotta do some halo testing to make sure the lights don't go anywhere, but it's looking like we'll have a fix in for 8.7. Changes should be on PBE today. ^^
